verses.verse: Therefore, <WG5620> my<WG3450> brethren<WG80> dearly beloved<WG27> and<WG2532> longed for,<WG1973> my<WG3450> joy<WG5479> and<WG2532> crown,<WG4735> so<WG3779> stand fast<WG4739> in<WG1722> the Lord,<WG2962> my dearly beloved.<WG27>
I beseech<WG3870> Euodias,<WG2136> and<WG2532> beseech<WG3870> Syntyche,<WG4941> that they be of the same mind<WG5426> <WG3588> <WG846> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>

And <WG2532> I entreat<WG2065> thee<WG4571> also,<WG2532> true<WG1103> yokefellow,<WG4805> help<WG4815> those women<WG846> which<WG3748> labored with<WG4866> me<WG3427> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> gospel,<WG2098> with<WG3326> Clement<WG2815> also,<WG2532> and<WG2532> with other<WG3062> my<WG3450> fellow laborers,<WG4904> whose<WG3739> names<WG3686> are in<WG1722> the book<WG976> of life.<WG2222>
Rejoice <WG5463> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> always:<WG3842> and again<WG3825> I say,<WG2046> Rejoice.<WG5463>
Let your<WG5216> moderation<WG1933> be known<WG1097> unto all<WG3956> men.<WG444> The<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> is at hand.<WG1451>

Be careful<WG3309> for nothing;<WG3367> but<WG235> in<WG1722> every thing<WG3956> by prayer<WG4335> and<WG2532> supplication<WG1162> with<WG3326> thanksgiving<WG2169> let your<WG5216> requests<WG155> be made known<WG1107> unto<WG4314> God.<WG2316>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> peace<WG1515> of God,<WG2316> which passeth<WG5242> all<WG3956> understanding,<WG3563> shall keep<WG5432> your<WG5216> hearts<WG2588> and<WG2532> minds<WG3540> through<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>

Finally, <WG3063> brethren,<WG80> whatsoever things<WG3745> are<WG2076> true,<WG227> whatsoever things<WG3745> are honest,<WG4586> whatsoever things<WG3745> are just,<WG1342> whatsoever things<WG3745> are pure,<WG53> whatsoever things<WG3745> are lovely,<WG4375> whatsoever things<WG3745> are of good report;<WG2163> if there be any<WG1536> virtue,<WG703> and<WG2532> if there be any<WG1536> praise,<WG1868> think on<WG3049> these things.<WG5023>

Those things,<WG5023> which<WG3739> ye have both<WG2532> learned,<WG3129> and<WG2532> received,<WG3880> and<WG2532> heard,<WG191> and<WG2532> seen<WG1492> in<WG1722> me,<WG1698> do:<WG4238> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of peace<WG1515> shall be<WG2071> with<WG3326> you.<WG5216>

But <WG1161> I rejoiced<WG5463> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> greatly,<WG3171> that<WG3754> now<WG2235> at the last<WG4218> your care<WG5426> of<WG5228> me<WG1700> hath flourished again;<WG330> wherein<WG1909> <WG3739> ye were also<WG2532> careful,<WG5426> but<WG1161> ye lacked opportunity.<WG170>

Not <WG3756> that<WG3754> I speak<WG3004> in respect of<WG2596> want:<WG5304> for<WG1063> I<WG1473> have learned,<WG3129> in<WG1722> whatsoever state<WG3739> I am,<WG1510> therewith to be<WG1511> content.<WG842>

<WG1161> I know<WG1492> both how to be abased,<WG5013> and<WG2532> I know<WG1492> how to abound:<WG4052> <WG1722> every where<WG3956> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> all things<WG3956> I am instructed<WG3453> both<WG2532> to be full<WG5526> and<WG2532> to be hungry,<WG3983> both<WG2532> to abound<WG4052> and<WG2532> to suffer need.<WG5302>
I can do<WG2480> all things<WG3956> through<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> which strengtheneth<WG1743> me.<WG3165>
Notwithstanding <WG4133> ye have well<WG2573> done,<WG4160> that ye did communicate with<WG4790> my<WG3450> affliction.<WG2347>

Now <WG1161> ye<WG5210> Philippians<WG5374> know<WG1492> also,<WG2532> that<WG3754> in<WG1722> the beginning<WG746> of the<WG3588> gospel,<WG2098> when<WG3753> I departed<WG1831> from<WG575> Macedonia,<WG3109> no<WG3762> church<WG1577> communicated<WG2841> with me<WG3427> as concerning<WG1519> <WG3056> giving<WG1394> and<WG2532> receiving,<WG3028> but<WG1508> ye<WG5210> only.<WG3441>
For <WG3754> even<WG2532> in<WG1722> Thessalonica<WG2332> ye sent<WG3992> <WG2532> once and again<WG530> <WG2532> <WG1364> unto<WG1519> my<WG3427> necessity.<WG5532>
Not <WG3756> because<WG3754> I desire<WG1934> a gift:<WG1390> but<WG235> I desire<WG1934> fruit<WG2590> that may abound<WG4121> to<WG1519> your<WG5216> account.<WG3056>

But <WG1161> I have<WG568> all,<WG3956> and<WG2532> abound:<WG4052> I am full,<WG4137> having received<WG1209> of<WG3844> Epaphroditus<WG1891> the things<WG3588> which were sent from<WG3844> you,<WG5216> an odor<WG3744> of a sweet smell,<WG2175> a sacrifice<WG2378> acceptable,<WG1184> well-pleasing<WG2101> to God.<WG2316>

But <WG1161> my<WG3450> God<WG2316> shall supply<WG4137> all<WG3956> your<WG5216> need<WG5532> according<WG2596> to his<WG848> riches<WG4149> in<WG1722> glory<WG1391> by<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>
Now <WG1161> unto God<WG2316> and<WG2532> our<WG2257> Father<WG3962> be glory<WG1391> forever and ever.<WG1519> <WG165> <WG165> Amen.<WG281>
Salute <WG782> every<WG3956> saint<WG40> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424> The<WG3588> brethren<WG80> which are with<WG4862> me<WG1698> greet<WG782> you.<WG5209>
All <WG3956> the<WG3588> saints<WG40> salute<WG782> you,<WG5209> <WG1161> chiefly<WG3122> they<WG3588> that are of<WG1537> Caesar's<WG2541> household.<WG3614>
The <WG3588> grace<WG5485> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with<WG3326> you<WG5216> all.<WG3956> Amen.<WG281>
